descr: "A request to convey information; e.g. the CDS system proposes that an alert be sent to a responsible provider, the CDS system proposes that the public health agency be notified about a reportable condition."

fields.name: resourceType
fields.descr: "This is a CommunicationRequest resource"

fields.name: identifier
fields.descr: "A unique ID of this request for reference purposes. It must be provided if user wants it returned as part of any output, otherwise it will be autogenerated, if needed, by CDS system. Does not need to be the actual ID of the source system."

fields.name: basedOn
fields.descr: "A plan or proposal that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this request."

fields.name: replaces
fields.descr: "Completed or terminated request(s) whose function is taken by this new request."

fields.name: groupIdentifier
fields.descr: "A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form."

fields.name: status
fields.descr: "The status of the proposal or order."

fields.name: _status
fields.descr: "Extensions for status"

fields.name: category
fields.descr: "The type of message to be sent such as alert, notification, reminder, instruction, etc."

fields.name: priority
fields.descr: "Characterizes how quickly the proposed act must be initiated. Includes concepts such as stat, urgent, routine."

fields.name: _priority
fields.descr: "Extensions for priority"

fields.name: medium
fields.descr: "A channel that was used for this communication (e.g. email, fax)."

fields.name: subject
fields.descr: "The patient or group that is the focus of this communication request."

fields.name: recipient
fields.descr: "The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, device, group, or care team) which is the intended target of the communication."

fields.name: topic
fields.descr: "The resources which were related to producing this communication request."

fields.name: context
fields.descr: "The encounter or episode of care within which the communication request was created."

fields.name: payload
fields.descr: "Text, attachment(s), or resource(s) to be communicated to the recipient."

fields.name: occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "The time when this communication is to occur."

fields.name: _occurrenceDateTime
fields.descr: "Extensions for occurrenceDateTime"

fields.name: occurrencePeriod
fields.descr: "The time when this communication is to occur."

fields.name: authoredOn
fields.descr: "For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation.  For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation."

fields.name: _authoredOn
fields.descr: "Extensions for authoredOn"

fields.name: sender
fields.descr: "The entity (e.g. person, organization, clinical information system, or device) which is to be the source of the communication."

fields.name: requester
fields.descr: "The individual who initiated the request and has responsibility for its activation."

fields.name: reasonCode
fields.descr: "Describes why the request is being made in coded or textual form."

fields.name: reasonReference
fields.descr: "Indicates another resource whose existence justifies this request."

fields.name: note
fields.descr: "Comments made about the request by the requester, sender, recipient, subject or other participants."

fields.name: text
fields.descr:
"A human-readable narrative that contains a summary of the resource, and may be used to represent the content of the resource to a human. The narrative need not encode all the structured data, but is required to contain sufficient detail to make it \"clinically safe\" for a human to just read the narrative. Resource definitions may define what content should be represented in the narrative to ensure clinical safety."
 derived from DomainResource

fields.name: contained
fields.descr:
"These resources do not have an independent existence apart from the resource that contains them - they cannot be identified independently, and nor can they have their own independent transaction scope."

fields.name: extension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance  applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension."

fields.name: modifierExtension
fields.descr:
"May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the resource, and that modifies the understanding of the element that contains it. Usually modifier elements provide negation or qualification. In order to make the use of extensions safe and manageable, there is a strict set of governance applied to the definition and use of extensions. Though any implementer is allowed to define an extension, there is a set of requirements that SHALL be met as part of the definition of the extension. Applications processing a resource are required to check for modifier extensions."
